name: The Sourcery
tag_list: recruiting, staffing, it-resources, technical-recruiting, hiring, hr, talent
overview:
We’re a group of recruiters based in San Francisco that specializes in working with fast growing tech companies.

We charge by the hour for our time and use data and proprietary software to make us efficient while keeping our work human powered and personal.

-We fill both technical and non-technical roles, everything from Lead Ruby on Rails Engineers to Office Managers. -We suggest and train best practices for new hiring managers -We handle everything from creating job ads to bringing in sourced candidates. -The service is scalability, because we’re a group, so you can use one recruiter or 5. -Companies gain the flexibility to hire 10 engineers in Q1 and then take a break in Q2.
